post.description:
Login is a call with the method(s) POST within the "LoginService" service.
It takes in "LoginRequest" and returns a "LoginReply".

## LoginRequest
| Field ID    | Name      | Type                                                       | Description                  |
| ----------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------  | ---------------------------- | 
| 1 | username | TYPE_STRING | The entered username | 
| 2 | password | TYPE_STRING | The entered password |   

## LoginReply
| Field ID    | Name      | Type                                                       | Description                  |
| ----------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | 
| 1 | message | TYPE_STRING |  | 
| 2 | access | TYPE_BOOL | Whether you have access or not |

Logout is a call with the method(s) POST within the "LoginService" service. It takes in "LogoutRequest" and returns a "LogoutReply". ## LogoutRequest | Field ID | Name | Type | Description | | ----------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | | 1 | timeoflogout | TYPE_STRING | The time the logout was registered | | 2 | test | TYPE_INT32 | This is the title

This is the "Description" of field test
you can use as many newlines as you want


it will still format the same in the table | | 3 | stringarray | []TYPE_STRING | This is an array

It displays that using [] infront of the type | ## LogoutReply | Field ID | Name | Type | Description | | ----------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | | 1 | message | TYPE_STRING | Message that tells you whether your
logout was succesful or not |

access.title: Whether you have access or not

message.title:
Message that tells you whether your
logout was succesful or not

timeoflogout.title: The time the logout was registered
